Plutonia.org

This is my website where I post devlogs and blog a bit about interesting projects I'm working on or have seen! Topics usually include low-level development, EEG research, and Linux/OS work.

PlutoniumOS

An operating system project developed as an academic exercise to learn Zig and OS design fundamentals.
